analysis.description:
HydroCoin.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol#458-461) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol#461)

HydroCoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol#567-589) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol#580-582)

HydroCoinCrowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol#590-594) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(hardwareWallet,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol)

HydroCoinCrowdsale.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-theToken.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x7be6327d21414a9da0ccb92925479530aff89e6a.sol)
